Detailed Description

Base class: wrapper and parser for external scoring functions.

Member Function Documentation

bool DrugScoreInterface::score ( std::string  prot_path,
std::string  lig_path,
std::vector< my_float_t > *  scores 
) [virtual]

Wrapper to ExternalScoringFunction::run and parse output score file.

Currently is operating under the assumption that PAIR_10 is enough. A change in options would cause the DrugScore output files to have a different prefix. Assume the .scr file holds the score only

Parameters:
prot_path String holding the path of the protein PDB file
lig_path String holding the path of the ligand mol2 file scores Pointer to vector to hold the score from DrugScore
Returns:
True if DrugScore seemed to work, otherwise false

Implements ASCbase::ExternalScoringFunction.

void DrugScoreInterface::sf_names ( std::vector< std::string > *  names  )  [virtual]

Store the string "DrugScore" in names.

Parameters:
names Pointer to the vector to write "DrugScore" as the first and only scoring function

Implements ASCbase::ExternalScoringFunction.
